__e: Anyway, there's no time for worrying about that now.
I said no, one of your friends did it and that she shouldn't worry about it.
Well, you don't have to worry about that, 'cause she already knows.
So you see, kids, there's really no reason to worry about me anymore.
I don't know how you're going to feel like hearing this, but you don't have to mind me.
Well, then, you won't have to worry about me being alone in the house with her.
The downside to being strong for everyone else is that you never get a moment for yourself.
I know my father has a lot of problems, um, I don't know if he killed that police man or what, but either way, he's still a person, and he's still my father, so, thank you for taking care of him.
But I didn't know that when a girl gets married she's supposed to stop caring about her father.
But you don't have to worry because I'll tell him we can't talk no more.
They don't have anything to worry about because I'm one of them now.
And you ain't gotta worry about me giving you nothing but the sho'nuff, 'cause that's all I know.
All you need to worry about is, right now, it's this big, and we need it to be...
They don't have to worry about me outthinking them from here.
Clearly I needn't worry about you when I'm gone.
Why bother with something not good just because it's something?
Yeah, he said to tell all you guys that you don't have to worry about him anymore.
When you... don't have to worry abot it anymore...... you realize how much more there is to life.
Excuse me, but the police couldn't care less about those street kids.

Tell your ma she doesn't have to worry about him anymore. Whoa! Whoa.
